Title: TexEditorControl
Description: The TeX editor control written in C#, which is an adaptation of ICSharpCode.TextEditor for TeX. Features syntax highlighting, command completion and folding.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
The TeX editor control written in C#, which is an adaptation of ICSharpCode.TextEditor for TeX. Features syntax highlighting, command completion and folding.

This project is the TeX editing component, which can be used in various TeX editors.
It is written in C# and builds under Visual Studio 2008 and .NET 3.5.
The demo application TestEditor is included.
